description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国重庆市下辖的市辖区，重庆主城九区之一。其现代化开启于1927年，由实业家卢作孚开拓。抗日战争时期为陪都重庆的迁建区，被称为“陪都的陪都”。
description.en: A municipal district under the jurisdiction of Chongqing, People's Republic of China, and one of the nine main urban districts of Chongqing. Its modernization began in 1927, pioneered by industrialist Lu Zuofu. During the Second Sino-Japanese War, it served as a relocation area for the wartime capital Chongqing and was known as the 'accompanying capital's accompanying capital'.

description.zh-cn: 中国实业家，民生轮船公司创始人。1927年起担任峡防局局长，在北碚地区领导了嘉陵江三峡乡村建设运动，对北碚的现代化发展有开创性贡献。
description.en: A Chinese industrialist and founder of the Minsheng Shipping Company. Starting in 1927, as the director of the Xiafang Bureau, he led the Jialing River Three Gorges Rural Construction Movement in the Beibei area, making pioneering contributions to Beibei's modernization.

description.zh-cn: 由卢作孚创办的中国轮船公司。
description.en: A Chinese shipping company founded by Lu Zuofu.

zh-cn: 江巴璧合4县峡防团务局

description.zh-cn: 民国时期为管理嘉陵江小三峡地区而设立的机构，卢作孚于1927年就任局长。
description.en: An agency established during the Republican era to manage the Jialing River Little Three Gorges area. Lu Zuofu became its director in 1927.

nodes.id: 嘉陵江三峡乡村建设运动

zh-cn: 嘉陵江三峡乡村建设运动

description.zh-cn: 由卢作孚于1927年发起的旨在对北碚地区进行现代化建设的社会运动。
description.en: A social movement initiated by Lu Zuofu in 1927 aimed at modernizing the Beibei area.

description.zh-cn: 1934年由卢作孚在北碚建成，是四川境内最早的铁路。
description.en: Built in Beibei by Lu Zuofu in 1934, it was the earliest railway in Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国抵抗日本侵略的战争。战争期间，重庆成为中国的陪都。
description.en: The war of resistance fought by China against Japanese invasion. During the war, Chongqing became China's wartime capital.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代作家、学者。抗战时期迁居北碚。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer and scholar who moved to Beibei during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代散文家、学者。抗战时期迁居北碚，其故居为“雅舍”。
description.en: A modern Chinese essayist and scholar who moved to Beibei during the Second Sino-Japanese War. His former residence was named 'Ya She'.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代小说家、作家。抗战时期在北碚有故居。
description.en: A modern Chinese novelist and writer who had a former residence in Beibei during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代思想家、哲学家。抗战时期在北碚有故居。
description.en: A modern Chinese thinker and philosopher who had a former residence in Beibei during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

en: Executive Yuan of the Nationalist Government

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府时期的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest executive body of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 嘉陵江三峡乡村建设实验区

zh-cn: 嘉陵江三峡乡村建设实验区

description.zh-cn: 1936年由国民政府行政院批准成立的北碚地方政区，1942年改为北碚管理局。
description.en: A local administrative region in Beibei established with the approval of the Executive Yuan of the Nationalist Government in 1936, which was reorganized into the Beibei Administration Bureau in 1942.

description.zh-cn: 1942年由嘉陵江三峡乡村建设实验区改制而成的县一级地方政区。
description.en: A county-level local administrative region reorganized from the Jialing River Three Gorges Rural Construction Experimental Zone in 1942.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期，西南地区的最高政权机关。
description.en: The highest governing body in the Southwest region during the early years of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，时任西南军政委员会主席。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, serving as the Chairman of the Southwest Military and Administrative Committee at the time.

nodes.id: 重庆市人民政府北碚行政管理处

zh-cn: 重庆市人民政府北碚行政管理处

description.zh-cn: 1950年根据西南军政委员会命令成立的北碚地方管理机构。
description.en: The local administrative body for Beibei established in 1950 by order of the Southwest Military and Administrative Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于重庆市北碚区的一所师范大学，2005年与西南农业大学合并组建西南大学。
description.en: A normal university located in Beibei District, Chongqing, which merged with Southwest Agricultural University in 2005 to form Southwest University.

description.zh-cn: 位于重庆市北碚区的一所农业大学，2005年与西南师范大学合并组建西南大学。
description.en: An agricultural university located in Beibei District, Chongqing, which merged with Southwest China Normal University in 2005 to form Southwest University.

description.zh-cn: 由原西南师范大学和原西南农业大学于2005年7月合并组建的综合性大学，位于重庆市北碚区。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Beibei District, Chongqing, formed in July 2005 by the merger of the former Southwest China Normal University and the former Southwest Agricultural University.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市北碚区的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Beibei District, Chongqing.

description.en: A Chinese political figure, serving as the Party Secretary of Beibei District.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任北碚区区长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, serving as the Mayor of Beibei District.

description.zh-cn: 卢作孚是民生轮船公司的创始人。
description.en: Lu Zuofu was the founder of the Minsheng Shipping Company.

description.zh-cn: 1927年2月，卢作孚就任峡防局局长。
description.en: In February 1927, Lu Zuofu took office as the director of the Xiafang Bureau.

relationships.target: 嘉陵江三峡乡村建设运动

description.zh-cn: 卢作孚就任峡防局局长后，开始了嘉陵江三峡乡村建设运动。
description.en: After becoming the director of the Xiafang Bureau, Lu Zuofu initiated the Jialing River Three Gorges Rural Construction Movement.

description.zh-cn: 作为峡防局局长，卢作孚开拓建设北碚，开启了其现代化进程，是中国历史上第一个事先规划、逐步按计划建设的经济开发区。
description.en: As the director of the Xiafang Bureau, Lu Zuofu pioneered the development of Beibei, initiating its modernization process. It was the first economic development zone in Chinese history to be pre-planned and built progressively according to a plan.

description.zh-cn: 1934年，卢作孚在北碚建成了四川境内最早的北川铁路。
description.en: In 1934, Lu Zuofu completed the construction of the Beichuan Railway in Beibei, which was the earliest railway in Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，北碚区成为陪都重庆的迁建区，接纳了众多内迁的机构和名人如林语堂、梁实秋等，被称为“陪都的陪都”，对其发展和历史地位产生了深远影响。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Beibei District became a relocation area for the wartime capital Chongqing, hosting numerous relocated institutions and famous individuals such as Lin Yutang and Liang Shiqiu. It was known as the 'accompanying capital's accompanying capital,' which profoundly influenced its development and historical status.

description.en: In 1936, with the approval of the Executive Yuan of the Nationalist Government, the Jialing River Three Gorges Rural Construction Experimental Zone was established.

description.zh-cn: 1942年，经国民政府行政院批准，嘉陵江三峡乡村建设实验区改制为北碚管理局。
description.en: In 1942, with the approval of the Executive Yuan of the Nationalist Government, the Jialing River Three Gorges Rural Construction Experimental Zone was reorganized into the Beibei Administration Bureau.
